title: Machine transcription: transcription technique
creator_credit: United States. Navy and De Frenes
brief_description: Demonstrates the correct method of phrasing, how to control and phrase at various speeds, how to prepare for a day’s work, compose a letter and how to correct errors in the transcription on the cylinder, the “Do’s and Don’ts” of good transcription.
